content: self fringing shawl materials yarn 2 hanks of noro kiso color 1 needle 10 5 32 circular stitch marker scissors darning needle pattern step 1 co 6 step 2 k6 step 3 p6 step 4 rs k4 pm m1 k to end step 5 ws p step 6 repeat steps 4 & 5 continue until first hank is completed attach and begin second hank step 7 rs k4 pm k2tog k to end step 8 ws p step 9 repeat steps 7 & 8 until 6 sts remain ending with step 7 step 10 bobble 1 st on ws and pull tail through remaining stitch you will still have 4 live sts on needle step 11 drop 4 remaining sts and unravel fringe
